title: Mike Pence says there was ‘no pressure’ in his calls to governors after the 2020 election
description: Mike Pence said there was “no pressure involved” from Trump to overturn the results of the presidential election when he called Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey in 2020.

title: Severe storms threaten July 4th travel, festivities across South and Northeast
description: As the extended 4th of July holiday weekend looms on the horizon severe storms are set to take aim across a wide swath from New York and Pennsylvania stretching down to Arkansas.

title: Online romance scams are netting millions of dollars — and pushing some to self-harm
description: Scams that once bilked victims out of hundreds or maybe thousands of dollars are now increasingly convincing them to move their investment and retirement accounts into phony investment schemes.

title: Park shuts down roller coaster after visitor spots cracked support beam shift out of place as coaster speeds past
description: A North Carolina amusement park shut down one of its roller coasters after a man spotted a large crack that caused a support beam to visibly move out of place as a passenger-filled car sped past.

title: Brain scans of coffee drinkers suggest there's more to feeling alert than just the caffeine
description: A recent study observed changes in people's brain activity after they drank a cup of coffee that were not present in those who consumed caffeine on its own.

title: At least 2 dead and 28 injured in Baltimore mass shooting, police say
description: At least two people were killed and dozens injured in a mass shooting in Baltimore in the early hours of Sunday, officials said.

title: 'Unabashed': Justice Jackson marks her first year on the Supreme Court unafraid to stake her own position
description: Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson's first year has illustrated that she is forthright and eager to have her voice heard, even when she is out on her own.

title: Ron DeSantis wants to ax an agency that investigated Hunter Biden
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis wants to cut four federal agencies if he becomes president — including the IRS, which had investigated Hunter Biden.

title: United Airlines aims to avoid flight disruptions ahead of US Fourth of July travel
description: United Airlines plans to make changes in flight operations to avoid weather-related disruptions ahead of the Fourth of July holiday travel.

title: Maine woman punches bear that chased her dog; bear bites back
description: A 64-year-old Maine woman punched a bear that was chasing her dog, prompting the bear to bite back, state wildlife authorities said Friday.
